commenter_a: As an Asian non-American, I have a lot of similar feelings with people from the video. However, one thing I do not share is the that even I am not American, not born here, you still don't get to say "go back to China" to me. I go where I want and I came here legally. America could be more friendly.
post_message: An editor for The New York Times wrote an open letter to a woman who told him to "go back to China." Asian-Americans responded by sharing their own racist moments using #thisis2016. Here are some of those moments.  Warning: This video includes racial slurs and vulgarities.
